attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament Under the English Bill of Rights
attributes.additional_details: The current Parliament has, in the opinion of the undersigned, failed to adequately represent the interests, needs, and voices of the British people.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned citizens of the United Kingdom, submit this petition to His Majesty, invoking the rights granted to us by the English Bill of Rights of 1689. Herein, we seek the dissolution of the current Parliament due to concerns regarding its efficacy and representation of the public will.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call a General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
